meanings.definition: A person who writes or constructs paragraphs.
meanings.sent1: The paragraphers at the newspaper work hard to create engaging articles.
meanings.sent2: I hired a talented paragraphers to help me with my book.
meanings.sent3: The paragraphers at the library had a competition to see who could write the most paragraphs in an hour.
meanings.sent4: She was a paragraphers, weaving words together like a skilled artist with a paintbrush.
meanings.sent5: The paragraphers stood out with their ability to make even the most complex ideas easy to understand.

meanings.definition: A tool or software used for organizing and formatting paragraphs.
meanings.sent1: I downloaded a new paragraphers to help me with my writing assignments.
meanings.sent2: The paragraphers I use for my blog makes it easy to create visually appealing posts.
meanings.sent3: The paragraphers on my computer decided to take a break right when I needed it the most.
meanings.sent4: The paragraphers was like a magic wand, transforming my messy writing into a polished piece.
meanings.sent5: With the help of the paragraphers, my document looked professional and well-structured.

meanings.definition: To divide a text into paragraphs.
meanings.sent1: I always paragraphers my essays to make them easier to read.
meanings.sent2: Remember to paragraphers your writing to improve its clarity.
meanings.sent3: The teacher asked us to paragraphers our stories before submitting them.
meanings.sent4: She would carefully paragraphers each section, ensuring a smooth flow of ideas.
meanings.sent5: As I paragraphers the text, I could see how breaking it up improved its overall organization.
